channel.title: CVE Feed for Ofofonobs -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ofofonobs -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-4308|2024-06-04T17:56:19.595Z -- ofofonobs -- hubbank
item.description: SQL injection vulnerability in HubBank affecting version 1.0.2. This vulnerability could allow an attacker to send a specially crafted SQL query to the database through different endpoints (/admin/view_users.php?id=1,/admin/viewloan-trans.php?id=1,/admin/view-deposit.php?id=1,/admin/view-domtrans.php?id=1, /admin/delete_cards.php?id=1,/admin/view_cards.php?id=1 and /admin/view_users.php?id=1, id parameter) and retrieve the information stored in the database.

item.title: CVE-2024-4309|2024-06-04T17:56:09.131Z -- ofofonobs -- hubbank
item.description: SQL injection vulnerability in HubBank affecting version 1.0.2. This vulnerability could allow an attacker to send a specially crafted SQL query to the database through different endpoints (/user/transaction.php?id=1, /user/credit-debit_transaction.php?id=1,/user/view_transaction. php?id=1 and /user/viewloantrans.php?id=1, id parameter) and retrieve the information stored in the database.

item.title: CVE-2024-4310|2024-06-04T17:53:53.861Z -- ofofonobs -- hubbank
item.description: Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in HubBank affecting version 1.0.2. This vulnerability allows an attacker to send a specially crafted JavaScript payload to registration and profile forms and trigger the payload when any authenticated user loads the page, resulting in a session takeover.

item.title: CVE-2024-4306|2024-06-04T17:53:47.746Z -- ofofonobs -- hubbank
item.description: Critical unrestricted file upload vulnerability in HubBank affecting version 1.0.2. This vulnerability allows a registered user to upload malicious PHP files via upload document fields, resulting in webshell execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-4307|2024-04-29T12:25:38.606Z -- ofofonobs -- hubbank
item.description: SQL injection vulnerability in HubBank affecting version 1.0.2. This vulnerability could allow an attacker to send a specially crafted SQL query to the database through different endpoints (/accounts/activities.php?id=1, /accounts/view-deposit.php?id=1, /accounts/view_cards. php?id=1, /accounts/wire-transfer.php?id=1 and /accounts/wiretransfer-pending.php?id=1, id parameter) and retrieve the information stored in the database.
